column1: description
A group of tourists constantly recording everything they see.
A drunken off-duty security officer.
A Diver, quietly staring into the void.
A tourist dressed like an 1890s English explorer.
A sex worker having a drink.
A group of Divers guiding a blindfolded member of their crew.
A guide escorting a group of tourists.
A Diver crew getting mentally ready to embark on their next mission.
A couple of technicians talking shop.
A somewhat famous Diver being hounded by tourists.
A reporter trying to get some interesting stories from a Diver.
Three figures dressed in white robes, silently passing by.
A couple of on-duty security officers.
A seemingly desperate Diver asking for a loan to pay this week’s fees.
A couple of security officers dragging a Diver while they kick and scream.
A small crowd watching a couple of Divers sing and perform acrobatic feats.
A maintenance crew trying to get inside a maintenance vent.
A Diver and a tourist beating the crap out of each other.
A tourist carrying an obnoxiously loud speaker that’s blasting the latest hits.
Some sort of preacher spouting nonsense about the Àrsaidh.
